description.name: Xero
description.tagline: Synchronise Contacts, Invoices, Products & Payments with Xero.
description.long: Integrate WHMCS with Xero to keep your billing system and clients in sync with your accounts. w2x sends Contacts, Invoices, Payments & Products from WHMCS to Xero and is commercially supported by our team in the UK.
features: Integrates with the WHMCS Cron Job
Supports single tax rate invoices (including VAT, VAT MOSS & GST)
Highly configurable but easy to install
